title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the original image continues to be displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout, the newly imported image should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
3. Verify that the original image is still displayed instead of the newly imported image.
